app_name: 得物 - 得到美好事物
developer: Shanghai Dewu Information Group Co., Ltd.
description:
得物App是集潮流装备、潮流商品鉴别、潮流生活社区于一体的新一代潮流网购社区。 
-鉴别服务开创者- 
得物App在传统电商模式的基础上添加“鉴别服务”，实现“先鉴别，后发货”的购物流程。“多道鉴别查验工序”的平台品控，为新世代消费者带来更安心的网购体验。 
-潮流网购- 
得物App签约了数百位业内具有多年以上经验的潮流商品鉴别师。鉴别师除了是骨灰大神级Sneaker玩家和潮人，更是潮流领域的“研究人员”。通过对球鞋、服装、配饰、潮玩、数码3C、美妆等产品进行系统性研究，包括资料收集、数据对比、档案建立、样本拆解和仪器检测等，力保鉴别的准确性。还设有独立的查验环节，对存在瑕疵的商品进行排查，拦截明显瑕疵商品，针对存在微小瑕疵的商品与用户提前一对一沟通，确保用户购买到经鉴别查验为无瑕疵商品。 
• 潮流单品：得物App目前支持交易的潮流单品品类丰富。 
• 竞价模式：得物App采取商品竞价出价的平台交易模式，竞价模式提供了每个用户获得公平交易机会。 
• 商品3D全息空间：得物App采集球鞋的3D影像展示。用户浏览实现可操控式自转，720度无死角查看单品的材质、图案、纹理、设计细节，为用户打造不一样的沉浸式购物体验。 
-潮流生活社区- 
得物App致力于打造年轻人的潮流生活社区，成为中国潮流文化风向标和年轻人的发声阵地。得物App社区聚集了一众明星以及潮流圈内数百位知名KOL。我们以球鞋和时尚话题作为潮流文化的切入点，持续沉淀潮流向内容，培育潮流文化沃土。得物App社区积极拓展符合年轻人消费观的品类内容，深度挖掘年轻人处于萌芽期的兴趣点。 

了解更多得物App相关，可通过以下方式： 
官方微博：得物App 
官方抖音：得物App 
微信公众号：得物App 
微信小程序：得物App 
意见反馈：打开得物App-我-设置-反馈与建议

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

• LIVE COMMENTARY: Unable to watch the match on TV? No problem: stay up-to-date with our detailed live text commentary.

• LIVE TABLES: One goal can change a lot. Our live standings will show you if a scored goal has changed the league ranking, as well as the current top scorers table.

Over 4 millions users rely on BetMines. Follow our daily betting tips for football, get notified by our Live and Prematch scanners, look at statistical trends for the main betting events, analyse team statistics, follow other tipsters bets, test your strategy by creating free virtual football bets, follow livescore and much more!

BetMines is a totally free football betting support application that offers several tools to help you increase your success rate and teach you how to bet!

--- DAILY TIPS ---
We are the best football predictions and football tips app. We provide FREE and accurate daily football betting predictions and tips for each match elaborated by an artificial intelligence algorithm constantly evolving.
The algorithm takes into account the history of the results of the teams, the state of recent form, head-2-head matches, home and away performances, statistical data of the reference league, any sidelined player, the fluctuation of odds (provided by an important bookmaker) and on the basis of these and other data elaborates the most likely outcome of each match.

In addition to the football tips of the algorithm, we also provide two bets of the day elaborated by our team of football betting experts: Doubling and Risk of the Day.
All the bet predictions are free!

--- LIVE AND PRE-MATCH SCANNER ---
BetMines scanners scan every second all football matches and send you alerts every time a match meets your criteria

--- TRENDS ---
Find statistical trends for the main events - like 1X2, Total Goals, Both team to score - for teams with matches in the coming days

--- SOCIAL FOOTBALL BETTING ---
Football betting becomes social!
You can follow the best tipsters in the application, copy their bets and become yourself a reference point for the community .

When you sign up you will receive 1000 virtual diamonds with which you can create virtual bets , both to test your gaming strategies and to challenge other tipsters and climb the rankings of the best tipsters of the day, week, month and ever.

The ranking is based on the profit generated by the tipster in the concerned period , so you can easily identify the best BetMines's tipster!
The best daily bets will be published on our social channels.
NB: You don't win any cash prizes, these are virtual bets ( and not real money ) with the aim of testing your gaming strategies and having fun at the same time!


--- TEAMS STATISTICS ---
For each team involved in the match we provide the results of the last 5 matches in general, the last 5 at home and the last 5 away games.
For the last 10 matches of each team we also provide:

- the percentage of results 1.5+,2.5+ and 3.5+ goals, Both team to score, 3 Way Result
- the mean of the corners
- Total goals
- Clean sheet matches

--- LEAGUE STATISTICS ---
For each league we supply:
- Standings
- Percentages of 1.5+,2.5+, 3.5+ goals and both team to score outcomes
- The minutes of the goals
- Average goal per game
- Average of yellow and red cards


--- BETMINES MACHINE ---
It is a tool that allows you to generate bets with a high probability of success taking into account the selected criteria.
You choose the leagues you want to bet on, the type of event (1X2, double chance, under/over , combo and both team to score), the desired odds range, the number of matches and BetMines will generate for you the most likely bet based on the criteria you have chosen.


--- OTHER FEATURES ---
- possibility to choose your favorite leagues
- possibility to follow the results live thanks to a livescore service
- possibility to access the best odds for each event
- possibility of receiving push notifications when our suggested bets are published, when a tipster you follow posts a bet or when the bet you placed is winning.

Follow BetMines football predictions, analyse the statistics provided, follow the best tipsters and create your own winning football bets for FREE!

Please have a look at our Terms of Use:
https://betmines.com/TermsOfUse.html

Your Ultimate Dive Companion is now better than ever!

Apple Watch Dive, Dive Computer Integration, AI Video & Photo Colour Correction, Freediving Training, Dive Community, Buddy Tracking, Explore Dive Sites and Shops Worldwide

All the diving features you need, now even more powerful.

Whether you’re a seasoned diver or just starting your underwater journey, DIVEROUT is designed to make every dive unforgettable. Discover ocean wonders, connect with a vibrant global diving community, and access all the tools you need to elevate your dive experience!

• Dive Computer Integration
Seamlessly sync and manage dive logs from nearly all major dive computer brands, now including CREST! Supported devices include Garmin Dive, Suunto, Shearwater, Diverlog+, Oceanic, Oceanic+, Apple Watch, PADI, SSI, ATMOS, UDDF, and more. Not listed? Let us know—we’ll prioritise integration!

• Industry-Leading AI-Powered Underwater Colour Correction (Photo & Video)
Our innovative AI now supports both photos and videos, delivering stunning clarity and vibrant colours unlike anything else. Instantly enhance your underwater memories with one tap, or fine-tune details to your liking. Batch process entire trips effortlessly.

• Professional Freediving Training
Improve your breath-hold skills with dedicated training tools. Create personalised plans, track progress, and unlock your full underwater potential—whether you’re a beginner or experienced.

• Enhanced Dive Community & Social Features
Diving is better with friends. Connect with a global community, follow your favourite creators, exchange tips, and share logs, photos, and stories. Build friendships and plan dives together—buddy tracking and relationship management are now easier than ever. Log shared dives, monitor dive history with buddies, and stay connected after the dive.

• Powerful Dive Log Recording
Record every detail—depth, temperature, bottom time, gas mix, marine life, and notes—in an intuitive interface. Add media and organise your memories professionally.

• Discover Dive Sites Near You
Explore top dive sites worldwide with our interactive Dive Site Map. Read reviews, view photos, and find hidden gems to add to your dive bucket list.

• Locate Dive Shops & Plan Your Next Adventure
Use our enhanced Dive Shop Search to find trusted local dive centres globally. Whether renting gear, joining a dive, or booking a course, DIVEROUT helps you get there. Now with detailed shop info, reviews, and filters by location and service.

• Keep Track of Your Dive Buddies
Never lose track of your dive partners. Add and manage buddies, review shared logs, and strengthen your dive connections. Perfect for group trips or sharing special moments.

Why DIVEROUT?
DIVEROUT isn’t just an app—it’s a vibrant community of ocean explorers. Whether you love scuba, freediving, snorkelling, or tech diving, we bring everything together. With powerful features, cutting-edge AI tools, and unmatched support, divers worldwide choose DIVEROUT.

Download DIVEROUT today and start your next dive adventure! Dive into the blue, meet fellow explorers, and turn your underwater memories into vibrant stories.

LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE
Listen to live match commentary (unofficial) from the LiveScore team, covering everything from scores, assists, corners, cards and descriptions of the action on football matches.

WORLDWIDE SCORES AND SPORT
Find your international team and follow live football stats, football results and scores. More than 1,000 live football scores and football fixtures are followed every week.

LIVESCORE HORSE RACING
View horse racing results, upcoming race details, jockey, trainer and horse racing form details across UK, Ireland and international racecourses. Favourite upcoming horse races to easily view every horse and jockey in the field, receive live notifications with the winning horse.

DISCOVER AMERICAN FOOTBALL
New to LiveScore is American Football! Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the game, we've got you covered with real-time game results, stats, and fixtures for your favourite teams and leagues, including the NFL & CFL. Stay updated on the action and follow every touchdown, tackle and triumph.

ABOUT LIVESCORE
Since 1998, LiveScore has been giving you real-time delivery of live sport scores & data. As leaders of live score updates, LiveScore is trusted and used daily by millions of users globally; specialising in the sports: football, soccer, tennis, cricket, basketball & hockey.

Live Football TV – Your Football TV Guide

Stay on top of the game with broadcast details for every televised and legally streamed football match, all at your fingertips!

The Live Football TV app is your essential and definitive guide for watching football matches on TV, via streaming platforms, and on demand. This app provides official broadcast schedules, live scores, and comprehensive football coverage from around the globe. With verified TV listings for over 4,000 channels and streaming services across more than 200 countries, you’ll always know where to watch your favourite players, teams, leagues and competitions.

Key Features:
- Live Scores & Match Details: Follow matches in real-time with live scores, stats, line-ups, events and commentary.
- Official TV & Streaming Schedules: Find out where to watch matches on TV, online, on demand or in replay – tailored to your location.
- Channel & Broadcaster Information: Access detailed broadcaster listings, media rights, and geo-availability.
- Customisable Match Notifications: Set alerts before kick-off – from 24 hours down to 5 minutes.
- Calendar Integration: Sync match schedules and broadcast info with your calendar.
- Search & Favourites: Easily find matches, teams or leagues, and save your preferences for personalised updates.
- Goal & News Alerts: Get instant notifications for goals, headlines, and key moments from your top teams and competitions.

Comprehensive Football Coverage:
- Broadcast Listings & Media Rights: View official listings and local media rights details for all football leagues and tournaments.
- Top Leagues & Competitions: From the Premier League to MLS, including the Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Saudi Pro League and more.
- International Tournaments: Full coverage of the FIFA World Cup, UEFA European Championship, UEFA Nations League, Copa América, Africa Cup of Nations, AFC Asian Cup, Men’s and Women’s Champions League, Copa Libertadores and more.
- Women’s Football: Follow the FIFA Women’s World Cup, UEFA Women’s EURO, Women’s Champions League, Women’s Club World Cup, WSL, NWSL, Liga F, Frauen-Bundesliga, Division 1 Féminine, Serie A Femminile and other top women’s leagues.
- In-Depth Match Insights: Stay updated with team and league news, previews, match reports, standings, player statistics, and the latest football headlines.

Enhanced Viewing Experience:
- Spoiler-Free Mode: Watch matches on your own schedule without unwanted score or goal alerts – customise how and when notifications appear.
- Team Content: Dive into team stats, squad details, and performance history.
- Tailored Alerts: Configure notifications based on your preferences.
- Follow Teams & Leagues: Personalise your app experience by following your favourite clubs and competitions.

Why use the Live Football TV app?
- Trusted Source: Delivering accurate football schedules, fixtures and news since 2004.
- Official Broadcasts Only: No unauthorised streams – only verified TV and streaming listings.
- Global Reach: Coverage for over 4,000 broadcasters and services worldwide.

Please note: Live Football TV does not offer live streaming. We provide broadcast information and links to the official rights holders.

Download Live Football TV today and stay connected to your favourite teams, leagues, and global football coverage.
